useCase.name: active
useCase.query: FROM portofino_public_groups groups WHERE groups.groupId NOT IN (SELECT groups2.groupId FROM portofino_public_users_groups ug INNER JOIN ug.group groups2 WHERE ug.userid=%{userId} AND ug.deletionDate is null)

useCase.name: current
useCase.query: FROM portofino_public_groups groups WHERE groups.groupId in (SELECT groups2.groupId FROM portofino_public_users_groups ug INNER JOIN ug.group groups2 WHERE ug.userid=%{userId} AND ug.deletionDate is null)

useCase.name: past
useCase.query: FROM portofino_public_users_groups ug WHERE ug.userid=%{userId} AND ug.deletionDate IS NOT null

selectionProvider.name: mysel
selectionProvider.sql: SELECT p.id AS a, p.nome as b, f.id AS c, f.nome AS d FROM public.persona p JOIN public.familiare f ON f.persona_id = p.id ORDER BY p.id, f.id

portletNode.name: portlet1
portletNode.title: Title 1
portletNode.query: SELECT category, count(*) FROM product WHERE %{'pippo'} IS NOT NULL GROUP BY category ORDER BY category
